```lisp
(:action manage_underpants
  :parameters (?u - underpants ?c - person)
  :precondition (and 
    (or (dirty ?u) (clean ?u)) 
    (available ?c)
    (wearing ?c ?u)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (when (dirty ?u) (and (clean ?u) (not (dirty ?u))))
  )
)

(:action use ; Use an item for a specific purpose and update its state
  :parameters (?u - underpants ?purpose - usage)
  :precondition (and 
    (clean ?u) 
    (appropriate ?purpose ?u)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (used_for ?u ?purpose) 
    (not (clean ?u))
  )
)

(:action make
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - object ?tool - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (available ?actor) 
    (available ?tool) 
    (not (processed ?resource))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (processed ?resource) 
    (used ?tool)
  )
)

(:action donate ; Donate an item and update its status
  :parameters (?donor - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (clean ?item) 
    (possessed ?donor ?item)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (donated ?item) 
    (not (possessed ?donor ?item))
  )
)
```
